## MetadataCache.on() method

Called when a file has been indexed, and its (updated) cache is now available.

Note: This is not called when a file is renamed for performance reasons. You must hook the vault rename event for those. (Details: https://github.com/obsidianmd/obsidian-api/issues/77)

**Signature:**

```typescript
on(name: 'changed', callback: (file: TFile, data: string, cache: CachedMetadata) => any, ctx?: any): EventRef;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | 'changed' |  |
|  callback | (file: [TFile](./obsidian.tfile.md)<!-- -->, data: string, cache: [CachedMetadata](./obsidian.cachedmetadata.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; any |  |
|  ctx | any | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[EventRef](./obsidian.eventref.md)
